faq.title: Skilled craftsman : how does it work ?

q1.title: How to find a competent craftsman on Artisan-Compétent?
q1.p1: Finding a service provider on Artisan-Compétent is simple, fast and fully digital.
q1.intro: After signing up, you just need to:

steps.item1: choose the trade you need (plumbing, electricity, masonry...)
steps.item3: explain your need via a short video, photos or text

q1.p2: Your request is sent to qualified professionals and/or competent individuals matching your criteria. You receive several proposals to compare and choose transparently.

items.escrow1: Escrow payment: the entire quote up to €5,000 is held.
items.escrow2: Above €5,000, only labor is held (except manufacturer artisans, case by case).
items.tracking: Digital worksite tracking: photos, comments and steps in real time.
items.amod: AMOD: an independent professional advises and intervenes in case of doubt or dispute.
items.abuse: Protection against abuses: possible intervention for manifestly excessive quotes.
items.pv: Digital report: no payment released without formal validation.

q3.title: What if I paid but the craftsman did not intervene?

items.escrow: Funds are held in escrow: the provider cannot be paid.
items.report: You can immediately report via your dashboard.
items.review: AMOD and admins review the case.
items.refund: Full refund if no intervention occurred.

q4.title: Why use Artisan-Compétent only for small jobs and emergencies?

items.neutral: Neutral contact in case of issue (AMOD + platform).

q4.p: Artisan-Compétent turns a stressful situation into a secure, controlled process.

q5.title: What VAT rate applies in France for renovation works?

items.rate55: 5.5%: energy efficiency improvements (insulation, heat pumps, etc.).

q5.note: Reduced rates apply to dwellings built over 2 years ago and may cover labor and supplies if provided by the professional.
q5.advice: It’s often better to let the professional supply and install; self-purchased materials are at 20%.

q6.title: What are the guidelines/obligations for providers?

items.goals: Artisan-Compétent reduces prospecting, eliminates unpaid invoices, secures payments and professionalizes client relations.
items.amodShare: Of these 20%, 5% goes to the AMOD.

q7.title: What are the guidelines/obligations for clients?
q7.p: See the dedicated section in the platform (unchanged text).

q8.title: What is an AMOD?

items.indep: Independent construction professional, no link to the site provider.
items.role1: Assists the client in technical understanding and quote analysis.
items.role2: Intervenes in case of doubt, misunderstanding or dispute.

q8.note: The AMOD is not a site manager and does not intervene physically. It's a guarantee of safety and neutrality.
